page.title: 06Gt.Coxwell's Occupations.
page.content: One or more people work in the area itself in the following employments:- farmer,farm worker,hedger and ditcher, shopkeeper,postmistress,gardener and riding instructress. Outside the area:- builder,doctor, agricultural engineer,plumber,estate agent,plasterer,bank manager,dentist, carpenter,distribution manager,social worker,Army and Air Force officers, airline pilot,stock broker,solicitor, rector,National Trust warden,chemist, motor engineer,Gas Board executive, lecturer,Fine-Art dealer,newsagent, speech therapist.A variety of posts are also held at the Royal Military College of Science and the Atomic Energy Authority. There are less than ten people out of work,mainly school or college leavers.
